blocks.name: iprodefisum
blocks.content: Applying the exponential function to an infinite sum yields an infinite product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm iprodefisum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, cfv(ce, c1)), cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cdm(cli)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  iprodn0(s0, c0, cfv(ce, c1), cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1)), c2, ccom(ce, cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wne(cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1)), nat0), wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cc))
  isumcl(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  efne0(csu(s0, c0, c1))
  3brtr4d(cseq(c2, cmul, ccom(ce, cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))), cli, cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1)), ccom(ce, cseq(c2, caddc, cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))), cfv(ce, cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3))), w0)
  climcncf(ce, cseq(c2, caddc, cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), c0, c2, cc, cc, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(ce, co(cc, ccncf, cc)))
  efcn()
  serf(s0, c2, cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), c0, w0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cc, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqbrtrd(cseq(c2, caddc, cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), cli, cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), cseq(c2, caddc, c3), w0)
  seqfeq(s0, c2, caddc, cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), c3, w0)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  eleq2s(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2), c0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  eqcomi(cfv(cuz, c2), c0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), cc), wbr(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cli, cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3))))

thm iprodefisum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0,(exp ` c1))=(exp ` sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c3 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c2(+, c3))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)

} = {

  climcncf(ce, seq(c2(+,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0)))), (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))), c0, c2, cc, cc, w0)
  a1i(w0, exp ∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ))
  efcn()
  serf(s0, c2, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0)), c0, w0)
  eqeltrd(((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0))` s0), cc, (c3 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqbrtrd(seq(c2(+,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0)))), cli, (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))), seq(c2(+, c3)), w0)
  seqfeq(s0, c2, caddc, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0)), c3, w0)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0))` s0)=(c3 ` s0))
  eleq2s(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c2), c0, ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0))` s0)=(c3 ` s0))
  eqcomi((ℤ≥ ` c2), c0)

  sylib(w0, seq(c2(+, c3))[~~>](~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))), seq(c2(+, c3))∈ dom(~~>))
  climdm(seq(c2(+, c3)))
  climcl(seq(c2(+, c3)), (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))))
  iprodefisumlem(c2, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0)), c0, w0)
  fveq2d(ce, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))), w0)
  isum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  3eqtrd(((exp ∘(hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0)))` s0), (exp ` c1), (exp `((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0))` s0)), (exp `(c3 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))

  fmptd(s0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0)), c0, cc, (c3 ` s0), w0)
  eqeltrd((c3 ` s0), cc, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))

  fveq2d(ce, ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c3 ` hs0))` s0), (c3 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
